com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting

Class ColorScaleCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.FormatCondition
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.ColorScaleCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles.CellFormatDataFormatHolder

    public final class ColorScaleCondition
extends FormatCondition
    Represents a condition that formats fill of all cells based on their values using a specified 2-point or 3-point color scale.
    See Also:
    Excel Conditional Formatting example

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FormatConditionType getConditionType()
      Gets the FormatConditionType.COLOR_SCALE value.
      ConditionalColor getMaximum()
      Gets the maximum color point.
      ConditionalColor getMidpoint()
      Gets the midpoint color point or null if conditional formatting rule is '2-Color Scale'.
      ConditionalColor getMinimum()
      Gets the minimum color point.
      String toString()
      Returns a String that represents this ColorScaleCondition instance.
